entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries this evening. Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
